item.title: Another dog poo middle of Castledine Road, 19th October
item.description:
Someone continues to let their dog defecate in the middle of Castledine road without care. There is another huge poo on the pavement where 58 anerley park flats put their bins.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castledine Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car seems to be abandoned, several PCN on window., 19th October
item.description:
The building garage door is open allowing cars to enter without key and permits. This vehicle seems to be abandoned in our garage. It has several PCN on the window.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grand Union Canal towpath, Maida Vale, London

item.title: Teens setting of firework frequently, 19th October
item.description:
Groups of teens on a regular base, illegally setting of fireworks. Endagering the children playground and people walking here. They also hold it in their hands and shooting it walking areas. This happened on 18/10/25, 17/10/25 and other dates. Also people who live here can not go to their balcony or open windows as they don't know if it will hit and set curtains on fire. On 18/10/25 a police car drove up, but many run away on the food path next to the river. Can more police patrols be done here in the area?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grand Union Canal towpath, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet
